content:
7476ec1d0a1d4b18944406b63cfa71:
  'Skill-Description': Identifies and resolves common network connectivity problems.
  'Entity':
    3b574a1ba1cf4e60b1b8dd7f002ddf:
      'Slot-Description': The internet service provider.
    b66b4a1df151465a9f8d4eedd60b7d:
      'Slot-Description': The type of network issue being experienced.
      'Required-values':
      - no internet connection
      - slow internet speed
      - intermittent connection
      - cannot connect to specific websites
      - cannot connect to Wi-Fi
      - cannot connect to wired network
867e30e9d77846ba8ad63e820658bc:
  'Skill-Description': Identifies and troubleshoots slow internet connection speeds
    on a device.
  'Entity':
    378c2c0460cc49a5a092ff3f355d5e:
      'Slot-Description': Actionable steps to improve internet speed.
    ec55f084e4a442afb8237c2c86121d:
      'Slot-Description': The potential cause of the slow internet speed.
b0c5d580d4134677b056b61ad9bc20:
  'Skill-Description': Guides the user through the process of setting up a new
    network.
  'Entity':
    305dcdbef43241a390d432391e8970:
      'Slot-Description': The type of connection to be established.
    3386e08614e04147b5d30a3d1361dc:
      'Slot-Description': The desired password for the network.
      'Required-values':
      - \b[a-z]{2}\d{5}\b
      - \b[a-z]{3}\d{4}\b
    3c2ced184c5f4c768a5d9bf0b9fe3b:
      'Slot-Description': The security protocol to be used for the network.
    6a2c76db209a40e18e02b4f7b5ae79:
      'Slot-Description': The desired name for the network.
    ba1f2c5af57a41afb21669751b9ba3:
      'Slot-Description': The type of equipment for the network setup.
    e72b9d0b8ace4e3c8753b3d7f502f2:
      'Slot-Description': The type of network to be set up.
000aa00a0a0000a0000aaa00:
  'Skill-Description': This choice is to be selected when no skill matches the user input.
  'Entity':
    9zzzz9z99999zz99:
    'Slot-Description': This choice is to be returned when the 000aa00a0a0000a0000aaa00 skill is returned.
    'Required-values': Not applicable
